name: Luca Trusiani
subtitle: Communications & marketing manager presso Snam
experiences: Project: "Fingerprinting: a robust audio hashing for content identification"

posts.post: Snam S.p.A., one of the best Italian companies for digital corporate communication for the fifth year in a row. Proud to be part of this team!

L'amministratore delegato di Snam S.p.A. Marco Alvera' parla di hashtag#socialmedia a LinkedIn Italia e spiega che "in Snam S.p.A. cerchiamo persone motivate, curiose e soprattutto che abbiano cuore" Salvatore Ricco Maria Cristina Giugliano Alberto Rusconi
Proud to be part of it! Salvatore Ricco Alberto Rusconi Anna Chiara Sai Davide Ciullo Giacomo Pagone

Proud of being part of the team that broke another Webranking record: 94,2 points out of 100 made us the best Italian company for corporate and financial digital communication for the second year in a row!
